content.html: meetings on remote teams are hard. we get caught between two conflicting feelings: 1. “I don’t like meetings” 2. “I feel disconnected from my team” I’m increasingly convinced that many (most?) remote teams are having on the wrong kind of meetings (a meetings thread, I guess)
content.value:
meetings on remote teams are hard. we get caught between two conflicting feelings:

1. “I don’t like meetings”
2. “I feel disconnected from my team”

I’m increasingly convinced that many (most?) remote teams are having on the wrong kind of meetings

(a meetings thread, I guess)

photo.alt: Boardroom suggestion meme. Boss: “Remote workers hate meetings. We need to boost morale!” Person 1: “Async only!” Person 2: “Slack bots!” Person 3: “More, but better meetings” [Person 3 gets tossed out the window]
